_header: A good tale hereby lies / Of a woman that hight Thais
_description: Thais, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
An ensampyll we fynd þisof on woman þat hygh
                    tayfys…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…& qwen sche dyed to god went schoGod graunt vs all so
                    forto do

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A Good luyte tale here lysOf a wommon þat hihte
                    Tays…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And bring vs to þat ilke blisÞer meke men wiþ
                    crist is. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 279.

BodEngPoetc3.First Lines:
A tall of a woman her by lyseþat I will say ȝhou or I
                    ryse…
BodEngPoetc3.Last Lines: …[ ] hir saule gaffe scho[ ] god þat we doo

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
An ensaumple we fynde of þisOf a womman þat hight
                    taysis…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And when sche dyed to god went schoGod graunte vs alle so
                    forto do

CULDd11.First Lines:
A Good litil tale here lyesof a foli woman þat highte
                    Tayes…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…þat to god hire soule ȝaf schoSo graunte vs god
                    þat we may do

CULGg531.First Lines:
A gude tall hereby lyesOf a woman þat hyght
                    tays…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Þat to god hyr saule ȝalde schoAnd swa len god
                    þat we may do

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
A Goode lyte tale here lysOf a womon þat hiht
                    Tays…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…May I not of hir penaunce telleffor longe hit weore
                    þeron to dwelle…
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
And a gude tale here lyesof ane common woman hyght
                    tasyes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat hyr cely saule to god gaf schoand swa leue gode
                    þat we may do

HunHM129.First Lines:
And a gode litill tale here lyisOff and hore þat heght
                    tayis…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat hyr sely gost to god ȝold schoAnd so gyff god
                    þat we may do
HunHM129.Editions:
Whatley,  Gordon E.,
                        ed.  
             Saints’ Lives in Middle English Collections.
         With Anne B. Thompson and Robert K. Upchurch. MI: Western Michigan
            University for TEAMS, 2004.
